thi-ap35:7.2: hitāya janataṃ bahuṃ → janatāya hitaṃ bahuṃ (bj) | hitāya janataṃ sadā (sya1ed, sya2ed) | hitāya janasaṃsariṃ (pts-vp-pli1ed)
thi-ap35:14.3: Uppajji lokasaraṇo → vadataṃ varo (sya1ed, sya2ed) | ca dīpavaro (pts-vp-pli1ed)
thi-ap35:14.4: araṇo amataṅgato → sabbasattānamuttamo (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1ed)
